data.name: Squid Run
data.detailed_description:
An old child's game with new killing rules! Run while nobody sees, stay while you are being watched! Any movement detected is punishable by death, and crossing the finish line is rewarded with a cash prize, which is formed depending on the number of losing players. Only the most cunning, strong and dexterous players who do not neglect any opportunities to beat their opponents will be able to win. And remember, this game is either all or nothing!

Features of the game:

  • The ability to play alone with bots, in co-op with friends or in multiplayer with other players.
  • An unique atmosphere of risk and near death, which can lead to any mistake.
  • Huge opportunities for replayability due to unique game mechanics.
  • Realistic, immersive soundtrack.
  • Honest and dishonest opportunities to win.
  • A large number of simultaneously playing players, giving the scale of the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB+
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 3 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB+
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
